name: inquest
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an official process to discover the cause of someone's death: hold an inquest An inquest is always held if murder is suspected.
an examination of or discussion about the reasons for someone's or something's failure: inquest into an inquest into the department's poor performance

an official examination of facts in an attempt to discover the cause of something, esp. of a sudden or violent death: a coroner’s inquest
